  • Instruct anchors and learn-to-lead courses at Devil's Lake State Park, Baraboo, WI. Lead family, Scout, and one-on-one climbing days.
  • Develop climbing curriculum for new courses such as Aid Climbing 101 & Follow Like a Boss. Taught these courses at the American Alpine Club Craggin' Classic.
  • Developed curriculum for and led internal guide training. Taught fellow guides in rescue techniques, anchor building, and pedagogy.
  • Developed guide service's internal trip booking system, using Zapier and Google Apps Script to connect Airtable database, Google Forms, Google Drive, and Gmail. View project details .
